modName: Unlimited Summon Karstaag and No once a day limit
summary: This mod allows you to use the summon Karstaag power as many times as you wish unlike the vanilla game which only allows you to summon him three times and then removes the power.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION:
In the vanilla game, the summon Karstaag power added by the Dragonborn DLC can only be used three times and then it is removed from your inventory. This mod changes that and allows you to use the power as many times as you want. If you feel this is a bit too OP, try out this mod by IAmTheRad:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32172/?
The mod by IAmTheRad allows you to summon Karstaag an unlimited amount of times but makes it so that you can only use the power once a day instead so you can use that instead of my mod if you prefer.

KNOWN BUGS:
I only know of one bug and that is the fact that the power is automatically un-equipped after using it. Its not a very big deal but it would still be nice to fix it. However, I unfortunately am not sure how to fix this. In the future I may try to fix this though.
Please notify me of any other bugs if you encounter them.
author: TheNo1RetroGamer
